data.description:
XR Designer is a VR game that allows you to design and share rooms.
You can visit rooms created by others, or upload your own models and wallpapers for use.

----Functions at a glance ----
Summon models
Change the texture of walls, etc.
Visit other users' rooms
Check your own data
Log in
Switch windows
Change weather
Change background music
Save Room
Load Room
Volume control
Change language

---Controls ----
Move with the left controller stick.
Rotate with the right controller stick.
The upper trigger on the right controller controls the menu panel.

 When you open the menu panel of a model and select a model: 
 You can summon & hold the model with the upper trigger on the right controller.
 Press A on the right controller to zoom in and out.
 Press B on the right controller to rotate the model.
 Delete a model with the lower trigger of the right controller.
 When you move the model while holding the model, the model will move.
 (More detailed explanation can be found at "https://xrsns.org/")

---Special thanks---
BGM: (C) K.Y., (C) L-side, (C) Sound Effect Lab
Model: (C) MASAYOSHI, (C) Dimensiva, (C) 3D Shaker
Image: (C) Pixabay

changelog.change_log:
"XR Designer" has been re-released with a new version in a separate application. Please change to the new "XR Designer".
Search for "XR Designer" in the Meta Quest Store and press the "View App" button in the App Lab below.
The new app has several times the number of models per room and capacity limit, respectively.
This older version limits some functions.
We apologize for releasing this app in a separate app due to the fundamental changes.
「XR Designer」は新バージョンを別のアプリでリリースし直しました。新しい「XR Designer」に変更してください。
Meta Quest Storeから「XR Designer」で検索して、下にあるApp Labの「View App」のボタンを押すと表示されます。
新しいアプリでは一部屋当たりのモデル数と容量制限がそれぞれ数倍になってます。
この旧バージョンでは一部機能を制限してます。
根源的な変更に伴い別アプリでのリリースになりました事をお詫びします。

XR Designer has been re-released with a new version as a separate app.
Please go to the Meta store and search for "XR Designer" to change to the new app.
The new app has several times the number of models per room and capacity limit respectively.
We apologize for releasing this app in a different app due to the fundamental changes.
We have limited some functions in this old version accordingly.

「XR Designer」は新バージョンを別のアプリでリリースし直しました。
Meta storeから「XR Designer」で検索して新しいアプリに変更してください。
新しいアプリでは一部屋当たりのモデル数と容量制限がそれぞれ数倍になってます。
根源的な変更に伴い別アプリでのリリースになりました事をお詫びします。
それに伴いこの旧バージョンでは一部機能を制限してます。

Some users said that the pop-up display partitioning time for errors was too short, so we have lengthened it a little.
エラー時のポップアップ表示仕時間が短すぎるとの声があったので少し長くしました。

Some people said the hallway was too long, so we shortened the distance to the rooms.
The position of the icons on the room panel was adjusted.
廊下が長いとの声があったので部屋までの距離を短くしました。
ルームパネルのアイコンの位置を調節しました。
